Orci Convallis

1. Robert Burton: *The Anatomy of Melancholy* 2. Robert Musil: *The Man Without Qualities* 3. Kazuo Ishiguro: *The Unconsoled* 4. Malcolm Lowry: *Under the Volcano* 5. Virginia Woolf: *The Waves* 6. James Joyce: *Finnegans Wake* 7. Thomas Wolfe: *Look Homeward, Angel* 8. William Thackeray: *Pendennis* 9. Karl Marx: *Capital* 10. James Woodforde: *The Diary of A Country Parson* source: [The Guardian](https://www.theguardian.com/books/booksblog/2011/jan/04/best-boring-books)
